div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 276 Athens, 1955 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T); c. 87 (Price) Contents: 38+ AE Athens: 1 3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 22, 35 ff.) 29 New Style (as Sv. pl. 22, 53-8 [5]; pl. 81 [18]; pl. 24, 62 ff. [6]) 8 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 107, 50 ff. and 75 ff.) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1956, pp. 227-8, some illus. Thompson, Athens, pp. 526 ff. Price, NC 1964, pp. 27-36
